reviews.text: Recent refurbished and very accessible for wheel chairs

Obviously I can't base my review on the train service, which veer from okay to shockingly awful.... but the staff here are always friendly and helpful when I leave or arrive. They also seem to keep the place tidy, cleaning up after the dirty scum who feel the need to dump their rubbish on the floor despite their being bins on both platforms.

There are a few good old boys working here who actually know how to do their job and very helpful, but at other times the ticket office is closed even though there is a member of staff hovering entrance who doesn't even seem to be paying attention.
Friendly and helpful ticket office staff who went out of their way to ensure I got the right train and connections, including the tube, on rather protracted journey to Purfleet in Essex. Thank you 😀

It's alright but I wish the ticket office was open more so I can actually talk to a person who can get me the right ticket within seconds instead of that slow old machine which doesn't even work half the time.
